summary: I am a committed professional with sound experience in project and programme   management. With extensive experience in project cycle management, I know how to successfully develop partnerships and work with government agencies. I have successfully managed large scale and multi-country projects.  I also have a strong track record in overseeing financial management of projects and assuring project monitoring and evaluation systems. Moreover, I am passionate to put my skills and experience to build capacity in the global south.

Topics we work on include promoting trade union rights and social dialogue, striving for a living wage and empowering women.

Through projects with partner organizations, and guided by our strategic long-term vision, I develop and strengthen cooperation with trade unions or organizations affiliated to trade unions, assess project proposals from these organizations, and monitor the progress of the projects. I ensure that projects are in line with the program goals of Mondiaal FNV and I cooperate in the lobbying and advocacy activities developed within the programs.
